segments.text: What did you do this weekend , Kate ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Diane and I went for a drive in the country on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds nice . Where did you go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We drove to the lake and had a picnic . We had a great time ! How about you ? Did you do anything special ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really . I just worked on my car all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That old thing ! Why don't you just buy a new one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But then what would I do every weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1
